Sanskrit: शीघ्रं कानि अपि खाद्यानि क्रीत्वा आगच्छ।

English: oh! She gave me an errand
I have an errand for you.
Biscuits in the shapes of animals.

Sanskrit: चिन्ता मास्तु। पश्वाकारे चर्पट्यः रोचन्ते मे।
English: DON'T Worry ABOUT IT, I LOvE ANIMAL BISCUITS!
LOOKING AT ME SuCh A FACE.

Sanskrit: किम् इदम्? मम मुखाय किं जातम्?
English: T-THIS IS... WHAT HAPPENED TO MY Face?!

Sanskrit: पशु-विवर्तमान-चर्पट्यः सन्ति ताः। विना मम अनुज्ञां किमर्थं खादितवान् त्वम्?
English: THOSE WERE "ANIMAL TRANSFORMATion BISCUITS!" HOW COULd you EAT THEM WITHOuT MY PERmiSSION!?
It takes effect shortly after you eat it.
YOU SHOULD BE BACK TO NORMAL AFTER 5 MINUTES.

Sanskrit: अतिथये परिविष्टवान् त्वम् किम्? समस्या भविष्यति।
English: you MAdE youR GUEST EAT SOME...That'll BE A problem...

Sanskrit: अतिथये ददौ किम्? समस्या भविष्यति। You gave some to your guest? That will be a problem.
एकं, द्वे, त्रीणी,...अहो! चतस्रः अखादीत्! कियान् लोभी!
English: One, two, three..Ah! You ate four of them! How greedy!
Do you feel strange at all?
What is this? you are being rude!!
Are there any ways to avoid the effects?
He is beginning to act like a horse.
Sir could you please come over here?

Sanskrit: यावत् पर्यन्तं स्वीय-रूपं न धरति तावत् पर्यन्तम् अत्रैव तिष्ठतु।
English: Please stay until you are back to normal.
They are on the front porch.
Ah, You are fine now. You can go back.
It may not suit your tastes.
Please go to the bathroom again.
Hello! Who am I speaking to?

Sanskrit: होहो! मम परिचयं दातुं न शक्यते।
English: Hee hee I can't really tell you who I am.

Sanskrit: कश्चन मम परिहासं कुर्वन् अस्ति। कुप्यन् अस्मि।
English: Somebody's mocking me! I'm getting angry!

Sanskrit: अतिथिना सह किं करोषि? क्षमां न करोमि।
English: What are you doing to our guest? You won't get away with this!!
I'm dreadfully sorry we weren't able to entertain you very long.
Don't you wanna stay a bit.
You still have one more left.
I'm sure Mama is angry now.

Sanskrit: गृहे प्रतिगमनात् बहु भयम् अनुभवन् अस्मि।
English: I'm too afraid to go home.
Did you do something wrong again?
I'll go apologise to your mother for you.

Sanskrit: अहो त्वम् अपि काश्चन चखादिथ किल?
English: Ah, you ate some too. Didn't you?
